rooms.Name: Entrance to the Land of Xanth
rooms.Description:
You have crossed over from drear Mundania to find yourself on a wide, well-
taken-care-of path, which leads north from here. You notice a sign on the
east side of the road, printed in large, easy-to-read block letters. You can
continue along the path, or leave the Land of Xanth to the south.

Exits.Description: Through a shimmering curtain or raw magic, you see the path back to Mundania.

ExtraDescs.Description:
Printed in large block letters, the sign reads:

"The Land of Xanth, written by Cati and Dyrewulf, adapted from the 'Magic
                of Xanth' novels by Piers Anthony."

Written below this legend in a larger hand, you see:

"By order of King Dor, travelers are hereby warned to STAY ON the magic
 paths. The forests of Xanth are VERY DANGEROUS to the uninitiate. The paths
 have been enchanted to keep monsters off, and are totally and completely
 safe for use by travelers.

"Please report any malfunction in the magic paths to King Dor. Thank you."

rooms.Name: A magic path
rooms.Description:
You are traveling along an enchanted path through the sunny hills of
eastern Xanth.  You hear the cries of strange creatures around you, but
none of them get too close to the path.  Maybe it really is enchanted
after all.  The path bends here, turning to the west, or you can proceed
south, back towards the portal to drear Mundania.  All around the path
you notice strange looking flowers and plants.

ExtraDescs.Description:
Most of the flowers you see here have blooms that look like small,
purple clubs.  As you peer at them, they try to hit you.  This must
be the African violent, you figure as you dodge another swing from
the plant.

You notice that a few of these plants look like large plaid bags.
The sound coming from the bags sounds terrible, in fact it reminds
you of... bagpipes?  This must be a bagpipe bush, you think as you
cover your ears from the sound.  Too bad it's not a master player
playing them though.

rooms.Name: A magic path
rooms.Description:
The path bends here, turning to the north. As you contemplate your next move,
a cloud of gnats settles around you, and suddenly you begin perspiring in an
uncontrollable fashion. You swat the offending bugs away, and the sweating
subsides. Apparently these sweat gnats are not harmful, only annoying, and
so the magic of the path permits them to harrass you.

rooms.Name: A magic path
rooms.Description:
The path straightens out a bit here, proceeding north and south. A number of
pretty flowers are growing by the side of the path. In particular, you notice
a small patch of begonias, who quickly uproot themselves and hurry away even
before they can be ordered to be gone. Some blanket moss grows a little ways
off the path, this particular path being a soft, warm flannel pattern. You
decide against venturing off the path to claim it, though, as there will
surely be more along the way.

rooms.Name: A magic path
rooms.Description:
You are traveling along a magic path through eastern Xanth, which turns here
and continues to the west. Overhead, you hear a plaintive meowing sound, and
as you swivel your head to look at it, you catch sight of a smallish animal
with the head and legs of a cat, and the body and wings of a hawk making
little swoops above you. It must be a kitty hawk, you reflect. The animal
is almost unbearably cute, and you cannot restrain the urge to smile as you
continue on your way.

rooms.Name: A magic path
rooms.Description:
Continuing along the magic path, you come to another small grove of vegetation,
several trees and shrubs growing close together alongside the path. You do
a double-take as a small tree with several pairs of thick leather shoes
hanging from the branches catches your eye. You pull on a pair, and they
seem to actually be part of the tree. A...shoe tree? You shake your head
in wonder at the strange forms life takes in the Land of Xanth.

rooms.Name: A magic path
rooms.Description:
The landscape around the path grows drier here, and you pass through a patch
that is full-fledged sand. It smells kind of odd, you reflect, and as you
scoop up a handful and touch your tongue to it, you realize that it is not
silicon, but sucrose. Sugar sand? This place gets weirder all the time! The
magic path turns here, continuing to the north.

rooms.Name: A magic path
rooms.Description:
The path diverts again here, curving in a westerly direction at a lazy pace.
It's still pretty dry around here, but you notice a lush forest up ahead.
Must be an underground spring. Suddenly, you feel a sharp pain in your foot.
Pulling it out of your boot and examining it, you notice a number of large,
ugly burrs pricking it. Trying to detach them only makes them hurt more.
After awhile, you are so frustrated that you let out a stream of expletives
that would make an anti-paladin blush. Immediately, the burrs drop off. You
shake your head in wonder and put your boot back on.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are traveling on a magic path through Western Xanth. The forest has
grown unrestrained here, right up to the edge of the path. The path
continues west, or you may enter the forest to the north.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are on a magic path in Eastern Xanth. The forest has grown up right to
the edge of the path here. The path turns here, continuing to the north, or
you can enter the forest to the west.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are walking along a magical path through eastern Xanth. The forest has
grown up until it almost, but not quite, touches the path here. The path
bends here, leading south and west. To the north and east you can enter
the forest, if you are feeling very brave, stupid, or suicidal.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are on a magic path that is taking you through the forests of Eastern
Xanth. The path continues east and west, and you can enter the forest to the
north or south from here.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are on a magic path that is taking you through the forests of Eastern
Xanth. The path continues east, and comes to an intersection to the west. You
may also enter the forest to the north or south.

rooms.Name: An intersection in the magic path
rooms.Description:
You are at an intersection where two paths meet. A sign directs you east
to "Mundania," south to something called the "Gap Chasm," or north to
North Village and Castle Roogna. You may also leave the path and enter
the forest by going west.

rooms.Name: The path ends
rooms.Description:
You have come to the end of the magic path. You are looking straight down 
into a tremendous gorge. It spreads to the east and west for miles, and you
can easily believe that it cuts the entire peninsula in half. You can
probably descend into the gorge without a problem, but there are omnious
snorting noises down there that make you wary of leaving the safety of the
magic path. The path leads north from here.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are at a bend in the magic path. It continues south and west from here,
or you can enter the forest to the north or east.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are on a magic path that leads east and west through central Xanth. You
may also enter the forest to the north or south.

rooms.Name: The path divides
rooms.Description:
The magic path divides here. A sign proclaims that the "North Village" lies
along the northern branch, while to the west lies "Castle Roogna" and to
the east, "Mundania". You may also enter the forest to the south.

rooms.Name: Path to the North Village
rooms.Description:
The magic path ends here. A smaller dirt road continues north, where you
spy a large human village, full of people at work and play. You may also go
back to the path by heading south, or enter the forest to the east or west.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are on a magic path that is guiding you through central Xanth. The path
continues west, and to the east you spy a crossroads. You also have the
option of entering the forest to the north or south.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are on a magic path in central Xanth. The path leads east and west from
here, or you may enter the forest to the north or south.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are on a magic path in central Xanth. The path takes a small bend here,
running north and east now, and the forest awaits to the west.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are traveling on a magic path through central Xanth. The path bends here,
continuing south and west, or you may enter the forest to the north or to
the east.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are traveling down an enchanted path through the forests of central Xanth.
The path continues east and west here, or you may enter the forest to the
north or south, if you so desire.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are traversing an enchanted path through the forests of Central Xanth.
The path bends here, continuing south or east, or you may enter the forest
to either the north or the west.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are continuing along a magic path through the forest. The path leads
north and south from here, and the forest lies to the east and west.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are traveling on a magic path through the forest of central Xanth. The
path heads north and south from here, or you can enter the forest, to the
east and west.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are on an enchanted path through the forests of central Xanth. The path
continues to the north and south, and to the east and west you are able to
enter the dark and treacherous forest.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are at a bend on the magic path, which now continues to the north and
to the west. The forest surrounds you to the south and the east.

rooms.Name: A magic path through the forest
rooms.Description:
You are traveling on a magic path through the forests of Xanth. A very large,
very old castle can be seen at the end of the path to the west, which also
continues to the east. You may also go north or south, and enter the forest.

rooms.Name: A magic path
rooms.Description:
The magic path has taken you out of the forest, and you are now closing in
on a very large castle at the end of the path. The path bends here, and you
can continue north or east from here.

rooms.Name: A magic path
rooms.Description:
You are still headed down a magic path through Central Xanth. Up ahead, the
path ends at the drawbridge of a huge, old castle. The path leads south and
west from here.

rooms.Name: End of the magic path
rooms.Description:
The magic path comes to an end here, at the drawbridge to the huge old
castle you have been noticing since you left the forest. Could this be
the famous Castle Roogna? There's only one way to find out. The drawbridge
lies to the west, or you can proceed east, back down the magic path.

rooms.Name: Another magic path
rooms.Description:
You are on another magic path, having just escaped the...the...what was it
you just escaped? You don't seem to be able to remember. Oh well. The path
you are on leads south from here, or you can enter the forest to the east.
You notice a large castle at the end of the path, fairly new-looking.

rooms.Name: On the magic path
rooms.Description:
You are walking along a magic path in south-central Xanth, having crossed the
...the...whatever it was you crossed. A castle lies at the end of this path,
which bends to the east here. You can also go north.

rooms.Name: On the magic path
rooms.Description:
You are on a magic path, heading toward a large castle to the south. The path
continues east and west here, or you can enter the forest to the north.

rooms.Name: On the magic path
rooms.Description:
Continuing down the magic path, you realize that you are quite close to the
castle now. The path bends to the south here, where it ends right at the
drawbridge to the castle, which is closed. The path continues to the west,
and you may enter the forest to the north or east if you so desire.

rooms.Name: End of the magic path
rooms.Description:
You are at the end of a magic path, leading through south-central Xanth.
To the north, the path continues back through the forest, and to the south
you see the (closed) drawbridge to the castle of Good Magician Humfrey.
Rumor has it that there are three challenges that must be passed before
you can enter the castle, and ask the Good Magician your Question. But beware
of the price...the Good Magician charges a year's service for every Answer.

rooms.Name: A magic path
rooms.Description:
You have just left the western part of the North Village, and you are now
traveling along a magic path through northern Xanth. The path leads to the
west here, and you think you can smell horseflesh further down the path.
Strange. You can also re-enter the Village to the east, if you so desire.

rooms.Name: A magic path
rooms.Description:
You are on a magic path leading away from the North Village. The path bends
here, turning to the north, or you can proceed east, back toward the Village.
You catch a slight whiff of horses from the north.

rooms.Name: A magic path
rooms.Description:
Continuing down tha magic path, you notice the smell of horses increasing.
You are also beginning to hear the clip-clop of hooves striking the ground,
and some deep human voices. Perhaps this is where the villagers keep their
stable. The path continues north and south here.

rooms.Name: A magic path
rooms.Description:
You are traveling a magic path through northern Xanth, which leads north and
south from here. To the south, the path continues toward the North Village,
and you hear the sounds of horses to the north.

rooms.Name: Entrance to Centaur Village
rooms.Description:
You are at the end of the magic path, still wondering where the smell of
horseflesh is coming from, when movement catches your eye to the north. A
large form steps into view, with the lower body of a horse and the upper
body of a large, sturdy man. A centaur! You quickly revise all of your
preconceptions, and after eyeing the large longbow slung over his back,
decide to be very, very nice to these people. You can enter the village to
the north, or continue south, back towards the North Village.

rooms.Name: The forest in eastern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You have left the magic path, and entered the treacherous forests of eastern
Xanth. Something deep in your bones tell you that this was not a wise move.
You hear something VERY large moving about in the underbrush, and as you
grip the handle of your weapon, you wonder if it might not be a better idea
to get back to the path before it's too late. The path lies to the south
and west, or you can go deeper into the forest to the north.

rooms.Name: Deep in the forest in eastern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You are deep in the forest, fairly far from the magic path that brought
you here. It is rather dark here, and you hear a lot of movement in the
area around you. The forest continues to the south and west from here.

rooms.Name: The forest in eastern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You have left the magic path and are now in the perilous forest of eastern
Xanth, where wild and dangerous creatures roam, unafraid of humans. Even the
plant life can be dangerous, you have heard. The number and intensity of
the signs of life around you is rather unsettling, and you feel that it
might be better to get back onto the safe magic path, to the south. However,
the foolhardy among you can continue through the forest, which continues
to the east and the west from here.

rooms.Name: The forest in eastern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You have left the magic path, and are now wending your way through the forest.
This portion of it seems fairly quiet, and you are still trying to decide if
that should reassure you when you notice a large number of bones that have
been piled rather sloppily under some concealing underbrush. Ummm...The
forest continues to the north, east, and west, and to the south, you can
get back to the magic path, and safety.

rooms.Name: The forest in eastern Xanth
rooms.Description:
Having left the magic path, you are now in the dangerous forest of eastern
Xanth. Life abounds here, including strange-looking flora, insects of a
variety of sizes and colors, and a number of other things that perhaps it
would be best not to examine too closely. The forest continues to the north
and east, and the magic path lies to the south and west.

rooms.Name: The forest in eastern Xanth
rooms.Description:
Maybe leaving the path wasn't such a great idea after all. As you make your
way between the strange-smelling trees in this area, you catch a whiff of
carrion, as if something has died here not too long ago. Of course, you
tell yourself nervously, some plants make that smell naturally. You can
get back on the magic path to the north or east, and the forest continues
to the west from here.

rooms.Name: The forest in eastern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You are in the treacherous forest of eastern Xanth, having foolishly walked
off of the magic path. Lots of strange and disquieting sounds are coming
from the forest around you. Perhaps you'd better do what you came to do and
get back on the path, where it's safe. The path lies to the north ansd west
of you, and the forest continues to the east.

rooms.Name: The forest of central Xanth
rooms.Description:
You have entered the forest of central Xanth. Surrounding you are many sorts
of trees and flowers you have never encountered before, making you wonder
whether or not it was a good idea to explore here. Also, you are hearing
some rather alarming noises from deeper in the forest, and you suddenly
feel that it would be a good idea to return to the magic path, to the north.
However, the forest continues to the south, east, and west.

rooms.Name: The forest of central Xanth
rooms.Description:
You are in the extremely magical, extremely dangerous forest of central Xanth.
Something that sounds very large is moving around and breathing heavily
somewhere close by, so you'd better move on. The safest courses look to be
north or east, where you catch a glimpse of the magic path, but you may also
go south or west from here, deeper into the forest.

rooms.Name: A clearing in the forest
rooms.Description:
WOAH!!! You narrowly escape certain death as you unwisely walk too close to a
huge gorge that seems to appear out of nowhere! Why didn't you notice that
before? The gorge is directly south of you, but there is no way to descend
into it safely from here. The forest continues to the north, east, and west.

rooms.Name: Deep in the forest of central Xanth
rooms.Description:
You are deep in the dangerous forest of central Xanth, having foolishly
staryed from the magic path designed to keep you safe. The trees here are
very tall, very old, and very evil-looking, and you feel as if you have as
much to fear from them as you do from any fauna that might be lurking around
here. In fact, you think you here some of that fauna now -- you'd better
move on! The forest continues to the north, east, and west.

rooms.Name: Deep in the forest in central Xanth
rooms.Description:
You have strayed very far into the forest now, and you are not certain that
you know the way back to safety. The forest is growing darker and more
sinister, as well as being more difficult to traverse. A sense of dread
sends chills down your spine as you continue through the forest. You can
continue to the north or east, where the forest appears to grow a bit
lighter, or west, where it gets even denser than it already is.

rooms.Name: The forest in central Xanth
rooms.Description:
Leaving the magic path, you have entered this perilous forest glade, somewhere
in Central Xanth. Loud hoots and growling noises surround you, and as you
remember what the sign back at the entrance said, you grow very afraid. You
can get back onto the path by going east, but you'd better do it quickly! The
forest continues to the north and west from here.

rooms.Name: Deep in the forest of southern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You are deep in the dangerous forest of southern Xanth. A number of odd-
looking flowers catch your attention, but you decide not to get too close to
them after noting the bones of several small animals close by. Maybe it would
be a good idea to find that magic path again. The forest extends south and
east from here.

rooms.Name: Deep in the forest of southern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You are wending your weary way through the forest of southern Xanth, having
ignored the advice of those who wanred you it was dangerous. You detect a
sweet smell from the east, and faintly hear some soft, soothing music. Maybe
you should go check it out; your nerves could use it. The forest also extends
south and west from here.

rooms.Name: Deep in the forest of southern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You are still deep in the forest, having left the magic path far behind by
now. As you walk under the shade of the sweet-smelling willow-looking tree,
you notice that the ground underneath its long, thick branches has been
completely swept clean of anything organic. That's funny...the branches seem
to be moving...but there isn't any wind...

rooms.Name: The forest of southern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You have left the path, and are now in another dangerous section of the
forest, south of the...the...whatever it was. This part of the forest seems
relatively pleasant, and in fact you see a pleasant-looking little path
leading east from here, further into the forest. Some sweet music
seems to be coming from over in that direction, and you wonder who else is
here in the forest with you. Maybe you should go look, instead of going
west, back to that boring old magic path. However, you can also go north,
deeper into the forest.

rooms.Name: The forest of southern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You are in the forest of southern Xanth, having left the magic path that is
supposed to protect you from harmful magic and monsters. However, this part
of the forest seems fairly quiet, and it fact a peaceful-looking path leads
east from here, and you detect a sweet smell and some beautiful music from
further down the path. Maybe you should go find out what it is, instead of
going back to that boring, prosaic magic path south from here. You can go
east or west along the new path, or north, further into the forest.

rooms.Name: Deep in the forest of southern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You have left the magic path completely behind now, intent on following the
sweet perfume and music along the pleasant little path you are now walking.
The little path bends to the north here, where it comes to an end near a
large tree that resembles a weeping willow. The music and scent appear to
be emanating from the tree. This is fascinating! Perhaps you should get a
closer look. The pleasant little path also leads back west from here.

rooms.Name: Inside the cottage cheese
rooms.Description:
This is a quaint old home belonging to Bink and Chameleon. Though they are not
original owners, they have spruced up the place to make it look nice and
homey. There is a small magical fountain in one corner providing an endless
water supply for all purposes. The bedroom is back through a door in the wall
of this room. The couch here seems to have been used recently... Perhaps
Chameleon is in her smart/ugly stage.

rooms.Name: Standing in front of the cottage cheese
rooms.Description:
You are in front of what once was a large wheel of cheese. Large being about 10
feet tall and about 4 times as wide. The rind had long since hardened, and
lost the better part of it's flavors. The walls are a fine grained,
creamy-yellow petrified cheese. All in all this looks to be one of the most
tasteful cottages you've seen. A small garded grows on either side of the
door, and you can hear someone working inside.

rooms.Name: A large hut outside the Centaur Village
rooms.Description:
You are in a strange looking building.  There is a huge hole in
the roof and a water trough the size of tanker truck off to the
side of the room.  The floors and walls are carpeted and seem to
have been ripped up by something with huge claws.  There is a
doorway to the outside to the west.
A sign demands your attention.

ExtraDescs.Description:
This is the great catapult.  It is used to hurl you from place to
place quickly and safely.  Simply state where you want to go and
the catapult will launch you in the right direction.  The possible
destinations are below:
Entrance to Xanth
North Village
Humfrey's Castle
Castle Roogna
Centaur Village

rooms.Name: The forest of northwestern Xanth
rooms.Description:
Curiouser and curiouser. Those little holes seem to be everywhere now. Here
and there you see where a tree has fallen because of extensive holing, and
most of the local plant life has taken some damage. Anyway, you can get back
onto the magic path by going south, and the forest continues east and west.

rooms.Name: The forest of northern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You are in the forest of northern Xanth. Things seem pretty quiet here, but
the only makes you more suspicious. You notice something odd; everything in
the area for about a fifty-foot radius is filled with holes about an inch in
diameter. Wonder what could have caused that? You can get back on the magic
path to the south, and the forest continues east and west.

rooms.Name: The forest of northern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You have left the magic path, and are now walking through the dangerous forest
in the northern part of the land of Xanth. Strange smells and noises assault
you as you walk around here, and you begin to grow nervous. Maybe it would
be best to get back on the path, to the south. However, the forest beckons
to both east and west.

rooms.Name: A small grove off the magic path
rooms.Description:
This alcove is surrounded by trees, a large pool takes up a small portion of
the north end of the clearing.  There is a strange path between the trees,
starting at ground level and cutting a swath at an upward angle.  After a
second look you notice the pool is filled with a white liquid... one
particularly large tree off to one side of this place has great claw marks on
it, as if some dragon came through...  What a strange place.
There is a sign here, demanding your attention.

ExtraDescs.Description:
This is the great catapult.  It is used to hurl you from place to
place quickly and safely.  Simply state where you want to go and
the catapult will launch you in the right direction.  The possible
destinations are below:
Entrance to Xanth
North Village
Humfrey's Castle
Castle Roogna
Centaur Village

rooms.Name: Off the beaten path
rooms.Description:
You have lost sight of the magic path that brought you here, all you can see
now is trees, bushes, and the occassional flowering plant. None of these looks
very trustworthy, though most are very beautiful. You see what seems to be a
large off white rock further north of here, maybe you should check it out.

rooms.Name: The forest of northern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You are in the forest of northern Xanth. You are beginning to think that the
dangers of the forest were perhaps exaggerated in the sign back at the 
entrance, when you suddenly hear a low growl, probably from something very
large, and extremely close. You can still get back to the magic path by
going south or west, and the forest continues to the north and east.

rooms.Name: Off the beaten path
rooms.Description:
You have eschewed the protection of the enchanted path in order to explore the
dangerous forest of northern Xanth. You can hear all kinds of sounds coming
from all around you. You can get back to the magic path by going south or
east, and the forest continues to the north and west.

rooms.Name: Deep in the forest of northwestern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You have discovered the source of the "zzzap"ing noises, and also the source
of the holes. A large, whitish object has been deposited between two trees
here, and some small white grubs are emerging from it at a fantastic rate.
They seem to be able to tunnel through anything, even air, and the "zzzap"
is the sound of the vacuum collapsing behind them. However, they go through
flesh and bone as easily as anything else, and a number of them are headed
in your direction!

rooms.Name: The forest of northwestern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You have left the magic path and entered the dangerous forests of northwestern
Xanth. Strangely, you do not detect anything particularly dangerous right now,
but perhaps that is dangerous in itself. To the northwest, you hear some odd
noises, something like "zzzap!", and you are debating investigating them when
you notice that most of the vegetation here has a large number of one-inch
holes poked into it. Kinda odd, that. You may get back onto the enchanted
path by going east, and the forest continues to the north, south, and west.

rooms.Name: Deep in the forest of northwestern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You are deep in the forest, far from the magic path that would have kept you
safe from maglignant magic or monsters, had you not been too stupid to follow
some simple directions. Things seem pretty quiet around here right now, but
you notice a bunch of odd-looking holes in the surrounding flora. Wonder
where they came from? The forest extends north and east from here.

rooms.Name: The forest in northwestern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You've strayed from the magic path, and are now walking through the deep,
dark, dangerous forest of northwestern Xanth. You can get back on the path
to the east, or continue through the forest to the north, south, or west.
You hear a bunch of strange "zzzzapp"ing noises to the west. Strange...

rooms.Name: The forest of northwestern Xanth
rooms.Description:
You are in the forest of northwestern Xanth. Strange flora abound, and you are
finding yourself enjoying the novelty. However, the warning of the sign at the
entrance has already reminded you not to enjoy yourself TOO much. The forest
continues to the north and south, or you can go back to the magic path by
going east from here.

rooms.Name: The forest of northwestern Xanth
rooms.Description:
Having left the safety of the magic path, you are now in the treacherous
forests of the northwestern portion of the Land of Xanth. You do not feel
very comfortable here, and you feel it would be a much better idea to go
back to the magic paths, south, west, and east from here, than to travel
north, further into the forest. But why learn the easy way?

rooms.Name: In the Gap Chasm
rooms.Description:
As you enter this part of the gorge, you get the distinct feeling that you
aren't supposed to be here. Perhaps it's the piles of dragon dung, larger
than any you've ever seen before, that led you to this conclusion. Or maybe
it's the quite alarming number of cracked and scorched bones that litter
the area. Whichever, as your bladder lets go and your bowels empty, you
decide that it is time to get out of here, NOW!

rooms.Name: In the Gap Chasm
rooms.Description:
WHEN is this gorge going to end? You have been walking for hours now, and
you have accomplished almost noth---wait a minute! Over to the south a ways,
you see a large niche in the rock, probably narrow enough for you to squeeze
into and climb up the side, if you are strong, patient, and lucky. Hmm...
something to the west smells funny...almost like...dragon dung...

rooms.Name: In the Gap Chasm
rooms.Description:
Continuing your long, weary trek through this gigantic slash in the earth,
you stop to catch your breath and realize that you can distinguish those
strange noises you have been hearing all along now. Something is moving
around, something heavy. It moves with a triple pattern, as if it has six
legs. It sounds big and heavy, and it is making loud snorting noises. You
had best steer clear of it, if you want to get out of here alive!

rooms.Name: In the Gap Chasm
rooms.Description:
Boy, this place sure is big! It feels like you've been walking through this
gorge for days now, and you are getting pretty sick of it. Those noises have
been getting louder, too, which does nothing to reassure you. The gorge
continues south, east, and west from here.

rooms.Name: In the Gap Chasm
rooms.Description:
You are walking through a huge gorge in central Xanth, trying to find a way
to get up the other side and continue your travels. You notice that the
ground is very flat here, unusual in a natural formation. It is almost as
if something very large and heavy has been walking around here for years
and years. You wonder what sort of creature would live in such a place...
and then you hear those strange noises again. The gorge continues south,
west, and east from here.

rooms.Name: In the Gap Chasm
rooms.Description:
After a long and dangerous climb, you've made it into the bottom of the gorge.
It is truly enormous, and would probably take days to explore completely.
Luckily, you don't intend to do that...you just need to find a way up the
other side. You hear some strange noises from the west, but as yet they are
too faint to identify. You can continue west and south through the gorge, or
get back on the magic path by climbing back up.

rooms.Name: In the Gap Chasm
rooms.Description:
You are on the south side of the gigantic gorge, looking around for a place
to ascend to the top and continue your travels. You think you see a niche
over to the east, but it might be a trick of the light. Something smells
really funny to the north, almost like dragon dung. Chilling thought!

rooms.Name: In the Gap Chasm
rooms.Description:
You were right, there definitely IS a niche here. It leads all the way up
to the top of the gorge, so all you have to do is squeeze into the opening
to the south and start climbing. It looks like the niche is too small for
the dragon to get into, which is another blessing. You'd better get to it!

rooms.Name: In the Gap Chasm
rooms.Description:
You have been walking through this enormous chasm for quite awhile now, and
you are getting heartily sick of it. You think there might be a niche in the
south wall up ahead, to the west, that would allow you to climb up the cliff,
but it could just be a trick of the light. Those noises that have been bugging
you continue even louder than before. It sounds as if something with six legs
is galumphing around, breathing heavily. Time to move on...

rooms.Name: In the Gap Chasm
rooms.Description:
You've been wandering through this place for an awfully long time now, and
there is still no sign of an exit. Rather depressing, actually. Still, there
is a lot more to this gorge, and at least you haven't been molested...yet.
You hear a bunch of weird noises from the west, and a scream that sounds
rather like a human. But maybe it's just the wind. The gorge continues north,
east, and west from here.

rooms.Name: In the Gap Chasm
rooms.Description:
As you continue your trek through this humungous crack in the earth, you
wonder idly what could have caused it. A shift in the rock deep below? The
fist of a giant? A curse from some forgotten deity? Certainly, whatever
caused the earth to split in two here was up to no good. The gorge continues
north, east, and west from here.

rooms.Name: In the Gap Chasm
rooms.Description:
You are walking along the south face of the gorge, hoping to find a way up
so you can explore southern Xanth. Nothing looks promising here, but as you
look to the horizon, you see that you have miles and miles of cliff face to
work with. Hopefully, it won't come to that. There are some strange
noises coming from somewhere to the west, like something heavy is stomping
on the ground. Maybe you'd better avoid that section. The chasm continues
to the north and west.

rooms.Name: A niche in the cliff face
rooms.Description:
Ooof! This is a pretty tight fit. Well, that will both aid your climbing and
prevent you from being interrupted. You have a long, tiring climb ahead of
you, so you had probably better get started, before you lose your nerve.
It's either that, or face the dragon.

rooms.Name: The top of the stairs
rooms.Description:
You are in a small, quaintly decorated chamber at the top of the stairs.
A number of well-crafted tapestries hang from the walls, but this is
obviously no place to sit and relax. Four hallways lead out from this
chamber, one in each cardinal direction.

rooms.Name: The northern hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a narrow hallway, north of the stair chamber. To the
north is a large oaken door, with some claw marks in it, but fairly small
ones. Perhaps whoever lives here has a pet. Inside, you hear a boyish
voice talking, but the door muffles the words. Maybe you should go inside
and introduce yourself?

Exits.Description: A stout oaken door leads into the room.

rooms.Name: The western hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a narrow hallway, west of the stair chamber. In front
of you is a big oaken door, very solid-looking. You put your hand on it,
just to verify this, and a voice crankily says, "Watch the hands, bub.
Polish don't grow on trees, y'know!" Shocked, you jump back a pace. As you
do, a stone on the floor remarks, "Hey, watch where y'going! I chip very
easily!" What the hell is going on here?

Exits.Description: A stout wooden door leads into the room.

rooms.Name: The eastern hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a narrow hallway, east of the stair chamber. In front
of you is a set of double doors, very sturdy-looking. Either the doors are
very good at keeping sound in, or the room within is very quiet. Maybe
it's worth looking into.

Exits.Description: A heavy door made of rich, dark wood leads into the quiet chamber.

rooms.Name: The southern hallway
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a narrow hallway, south of the stair chamber. To the
north is a stout oaken door, and the smell of perfume wafts your way from
underneath it. This bepeaks the presence of a female, and the amount of
scent (considerable) leads you to believe it is a fairly young female,
perhaps a teenager. You suddenly grow anxious, standing before the door
like a kid on their first date.

Exits.Description: A heavy wooden door leads into the boudoir.

rooms.Name: King Dor and Queen Irene's bedroom
rooms.Description:
This room is decorated in a fashion befitting the ruling monarch of Xanth,
but tastefully rather than gaudily. The main feature of the room is a large
bed, an old-style four-poster. It is made of oak, and looks very comfortable.
As you enter the room, you notice a bunch of loud whispering going on, even
though there is nobody in sight. Something sure is funny around here...

Exits.Description: A stout wooden door leads out of the bedroom.

rooms.Name: Prince Dolph's bedroom
rooms.Description:
This room is fairly lavishly furnished, but it's also the bedroom of a
pre-pubescent boy, so the lavish furnishings are in blatant disarray. You
notice a sloppily hung tapestry of the Land of Xanth hanging over by the
bed, and to your amazement, the people on the tapestry seem to be moving!
Sitting in a chair at a large wooden desk is a small boy, perhaps eight or
nine years old, in the rich clothing you associate with royalty. He smiles
at you as he sees you, and suddenly changes into a small dragon and back
again! Clearly a child with powerful magic...best to stay on his good side.
Luckily, he seems friendly enough.

Exits.Description: A stout oaken door leads out of the room.

rooms.Name: The Castle Roogna Library
rooms.Description:
You have entered a small, cozy chamber with soft, comfortable chairs
and a number of large, solid shelving units, stacked high with books and
tomes of various ages. A fireplace provides warmth and light, and you feel
very relaxed as you enter. This is a perfect place to sit down and have a
good read, and glancing about the room, you see a dignified old gentleman
doing exactly that. He bears an air of command, as if he is the ruler here,
though his clothing is simple and unadorned. He looks up at you and smiles
as you enter, then returns to his reading. Who could this be?

Exits.Description: A heavy door made of rich, dark wood leads out of the library.

rooms.Name: Princess Ivy's bedroom
rooms.Description:
This is definitely the bedroom of a teen-aged girl. Flowery tapestries adorn
the walls, except for one spot where a tapestry appears to be missing. A big
vanity sits in a place of honor on the south wall, and a young, attractive
girl is sitting at it, brushing her hair and humming. As you enter the room,
she sees you in the mirror and turns to face you with a brilliant smile.
"Oh, visitors!" she says gleefully, "I'm sure you're the nicest visitors in
the whole Land of Xanth!" And indeed, you feel as if you must be. Hmm...is
there magic at work here?

Exits.Description: A heavy wooden door leads out of the boudoir.
